content: *the **tulle kitchen scrubby** will have you tossing out your sponge it s simple to make just three rounds and even easier to clean throw it in the dishwasher the scrubby is tough enough to scrub off eggs yet gentle enough to use on non-stick pans pair a few scrubbies with some nice kitchen soap and you have the perfect gift * | materials | 3 matte tulle 1 j 6 0 mm hook susan bates finishing needles 2 | pattern support | find the video tutorial here 3 1 https //www hairbowcenter com/products/3-tulle 2 https //www joann com/finishing-needles-value-pack--yarn-weights-0-6/11824315 html 3 https //www youtube com/watch v=dkiyxjkcgxg
